name: daisydog
description: Safe Google Gemini AI-powered virtual dog companion for children with comprehensive drug safety response system, Supabase database integration, enhanced child protection, educational safety guidance, trusted adult communication prompts, and integrated ReadKidz ebook access - Updated to new Gemini API

scripts.test:local: echo 'Testing local response system...' && node -e 'console.log("Run test cases from TEST_LOCAL_RESPONSES.md")'
scripts.test:safety: echo 'Testing safety systems...' && node -e 'console.log("Run test cases from SAFE_AI_TESTING.md")'
scripts.version: echo 'Daisy Dog v4.1.0 - Read the Book Integration & Enhanced Educational Features'

author: Brian Ference
